head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths FUCHS, SILVIA ALBERT

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths FUCHS, SILVIA ALBERT

block.p: FUCHS-Silvia Albert. Age 95, Passed away October 28, 2000. Daughter of the late Gussie and Isaac Albert. Loving wife of the late Dr. Theodore Fuchs. Mother of Dorothy (Henry) Fuchs Fox, grandmother of Jane Fox and Nancy (Dr. Tony) Webber, great grandmother of Teddie and Paige Yohay, Tracy, Jamie and Andy Webber, sister of Harriet Albert Bookheim and the late Fay Albert Greenbaum, Jack, Sidney and Charles Albert. A loved and spirited family elder, Mrs. Fuchs was the President of Camp Lou Emma and an Officer of the Queens College Speech and Hearing Center. Contributions to Camp Lou Emma, 214-45 42 Ave, Bayside, NY11361. Funeral services private, ''Gutterman's'', Rockville Centre.

Contributions to Camp Lou Emma, 214-45 42 Ave, Bayside, NY11361. Funeral services private, ''Gutterman's'', Rockville Centre.
